content: I never could seeThe gist of this poesyIt was first opaqueIt remained a mysteryUntil it became a game If I could go backAnd talk to my teacher thenI’d summon beautyThen suggest we play a whileAnd if he said no I’d leave Shaking dust from feetFeeling wind upon my faceExultation timeIt comes to an end anonBest to know you were alive
